bot.description: The default bot, bets the floor based on the team with the most bets.

param.description: type of bet this bot makes
personality of bot

param.description: type of bet this bot makes
personality of bot
reverse team chosen

bot.description: Bot that goes allin on the team with the most bets irrespective of gil.

param.description: type of bet this bot makes
personality of bot

bot.description: Bot that bets 40% on the team with the most bets irrespective of gil.

param.description: type of bet this bot makes
This field is used to either store a hardcoded bet amount, or percentages for bots with betType=percentage
personality of bot

bot.description: Bot that bets 62% on the team with the most bets irrespective of gil.

param.description: type of bet this bot makes
This field is used to either store a hardcoded bet amount, or percentages for bots with betType=percentage
personality of bot

bot.description: Bot that bets on the team with the most bets, increasing its bet by 100 + 10 * (difference in bet count).

param.description: type of bet this bot makes
This field allows a bot's bet amount algorithm to be customized with a mathematical expression

bot.param: min(mxBet, mnBet + 10 * (max(leftScore, rightScore) - min(leftScore, rightScore)), balance)

param.description: personality of bot

bot.description: Bot that bets on the team with the most bets, increasing its bet by 100 + 20 * (difference in bet count).

param.description: type of bet this bot makes
This field allows a bot's bet amount algorithm to be customized with a mathematical expression

bot.param: min(mxBet, mnBet + 20 * (max(leftScore, rightScore) - min(leftScore, rightScore)), balance)

param.description: personality of bot

bot.description: Bot that bets on the team with the most bets, increasing its bet by 100 + (difference in bet count)^2. This means the difference in bet count is the number to increase by, and the multiplier on that value.

param.description: type of bet this bot makes
This field allows a bot's bet amount algorithm to be customized with a mathematical expression

bot.param: min(mxBet, mnBet + 10 * (max(leftScore, rightScore) - min(leftScore, rightScore)^2), balance)

param.description: personality of bot
